summary: Adds around 30 NPCs and more to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Want more stuff in Skyrim? This mod is really for you.

Features (Version 0.2):

-20 NPCs are added to the game, some of them are followers. You can find them anywhere in Skyrim.

-New Guards called \'BethesdaTurk Guard\' in Whiterun.

-2 Spells are added to the game, which you can get them when you kill the NPC called Nudu in Riften.

-2 Easter Egg.

-15 Books.

-The Walkthroughs of Imperial Quests. (For now, just in Turkish, but I\'m going to add English version)

More stuff will be added. 

Come visit us:

www.bethesdaturk.com

_______________________________
Bu mod Skyrim\'e yeni özellikler ekler.

Özellikler:

-20 yeni NPC, bazıları yoldasiniz olabiliyor.

-Whiterun\'a adi \'BethesdaTurk Guard\' olan yeni muhafizlar eklendi.

-2 yeni büyü, Nudu adlı karakterin üzerinde büyü kitapları.

-2 yeni Easter Egg.

-15 kitap.

-Imperial görevlerinin tam çözümleri.

Yeni özellikler eklenecektir.

Bizi ziyaret edin:

www.bethesdaturk.com
author: Crack23 Amonyak MeravY EagLe Eye ComradeDimitri and Birusk
